name: Dustin
line: Will. I just found him like this! I think he's having another episode!

name: Joyce
line: Will! Will! Will! Sweetie, wake up! It's Mom!

name: Joyce
line: Will, wake up! Can you hear me?

name: Joyce
line: Will, please, just wake up. Please, wake up!

name: Max
line: Okay, that totally freaked me out. Did that not freak you guys out?

name: Will
line: I... I was on the field and... and then it... it all just went blank, and... and then you were there.

name: Joyce
line: Will, I need you to tell me the truth.

name: Joyce
line: This shape, I saw it on the video tape from Halloween night. It's the same shape as... as your drawing. These episodes that you're having, I think Dr. Owens is wrong. I think they're real. But... but I can't help you if I don't know what's going on. So, you have to talk to me. Please.

name: Joyce
line: Did... did you see this thing again on the field?

name: Will
line: I don't know. It's almost more like a feeling.

name: Joyce
line: Like the one you had that night at the arcade?

name: Will
line: I don't know. It came for me, and...

name: Will
line: Go away! And I tried. I tried to make it go away.

name: Will
line: I felt it... everywhere. Everywhere. I... I still feel it.

name: Will
line: I just want this to be over.

name: Joyce
line: It's okay. It's okay. Hey. Listen. Look, look at me. I will never, ever let anything bad happen to you ever again. Whatever's going on in you, we're gonna fix it. I will fix it. I promise. I'm here.

name: Eleven
line: "Friends don't lie." Isn't that your bullshit saying?

name: Hopper
line: Hey, hey! Hey! Don't walk away from me!

name: Hopper
line: Where'd you go on your little field trip, huh? Where?

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, well, that mother and her daughter did and they called the cops. Now, did anyone else see you? Anyone at all? Come on, I need you to think!

name: Hopper
line: You put us in danger. You realize that, right?

name: Eleven
line: You promised... I go! And I never leave! Nothing ever happens!

name: Hopper
line: Yeah! Nothing happens and you stay safe!

name: Hopper
line: I don't lie! I protect and I feed and I teach! And all I ask of you is that you follow three simple rules. Three rules. And you know what? You can't even do that!

name: Hopper
line: You're grounded. You know what that means? It means no Eggos... And no TV for a week.

name: Hopper
line: All right, knock it off. Let go.

name: Hopper
line: Well, congratulations. You just graduated from no TV for a month to no TV at all!

name: Hopper
line: You have got to understand that there are consequences to your actions.

name: Hopper
line: Really? I'm like that psychotic son of a bitch? Wow! All right. You wanna go back in the lab? One phone call. I can make that happen.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah, well, I'm not so crazy about you, either. You know why? 'Cause you're a brat. You know what that word means? How about that be your word for the day, huh? Brat. Why don't we look it up? B-R-A-T. Brat.

name: Hopper
line: Hey! What the hell is wrong with you?

name: Hopper
line: Open this door! Open the damn door!

name: Hopper
line: You wanna go out in the world? You better grow up! Grow the hell up!

name: Mike
line: Do you like those grapes, Holly?

name: Nancy
line: Hey, Mom, I was thinking about staying the night at Stacey's tonight? We were gonna have a girl's night. Romantic comedies, do our nails, gossip...

name: Nancy
line: No, she was sleeping. But I left a note.

name: Jonathan
line: You don't have to do this, you know.

name: Florence
line: Oh, hi, Joyce. Listen, I gave him your message...

name: Joyce
line: Did he get any of my messages from yesterday? Did you give...

name: Florence
line: Yes, do you wanna talk to...

name: Joyce
line: No, no, I need Hopper. Just tell him to call me the second he gets in. Please.

name: Joyce
line: Hey. How you feeling, sleepyhead? Any better?

name: Joyce
line: Same as last night? Still weird?

name: Joyce
line: All right. Okay, let me see.

name: Joyce
line: No. Uh, actually, it's cold. Do you feel cold?

name: Will
line: No. Just a little out of it. Like I haven't really woken up yet.

name: Joyce
line: And I meant it. No doctor. You know what? I'm gonna run you a nice bath and it'll warm you up and hopefully get you feeling better. How's that sound? Okay.

name: Dustin
line: Morning, Dart. Got you some breakfast. Your favorite.

name: Dustin
line: I gotta go to school, but I'll be back soon. Sound good?

name: Mike
line: Stop being a baby and do it already!

name: Max
line: This is so disgusting. Is this really necessary?

name: Mike
line: What do you think? We're looking for Dart.

name: Lucas
line: Well, well, well. Look who finally decided to show up. After I drew the short straw. Real convenient.

name: Lucas
line: Are you just gonna stand there? Or you gonna help?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: All living things, from complex mammals to single-celled organisms, instinctively respond to danger. Expose a bacterium to a toxic chemical, and it will flee. Or deploy some other defense mechanism. We're very much the same. When we encounter danger, our hearts start pounding. Our palms start to sweat. These are the signs of the physical and emotional state we call... fear.

name: Hopper
line: Hey, you reached Jim. I'm probably doing something incredible right now and I can't...

name: Joyce
line: I... I can cool it down a little bit, baby, but we gotta get your body temp back up.

name: Hopper
line: Hey, kid. Listen, um... about last night, I, uh... I want this place cleaned up by the time I get back and then maybe I'll consider fixing the TV. You hear me?

name: Hopper
line: Yeah. Yeah, I'm on my way in, and, yes, I do know what time it is.

name: Florence
line: Joyce Byers has called eight times already this morning. Eight times. For my sake, please deal with her!

name: Unknown
line: Let's go. Pass it up now. Get open!

name: Unknown
line: All right! All right, all right! King Steve. King Steve, everyone. I like it. Playing tough today.

name: Steve
line: Jesus! Do you ever stop talking? Come on!

name: Unknown
line: What? You afraid the coach is gonna bench you now that I'm here? Huh?

name: Unknown
line: You were moving your feet. Plant them next time, draw a charge.

name: Billy
line: Don't sweat it, Harrington. Today's just not your day, man.

name: Billy
line: Yeah. Not your week. You and the princess break up for one day, she's running off with the freak's brother. Oh, shit. You don't know. Jonathan and the princess skipped yesterday. Still haven't shown. But that must just be a coincidence, right?

name: Billy
line: Don't take it too hard, man. A pretty boy like you has got nothing to worry about. Plenty of bitches in the sea. Am I right? I'll be sure to leave you some.

name: Jonathan
line: He just... just talked to himself.

name: Unknown
line: Trouble with your car, miss? I can give you two a lift if you like.

name: Unknown
line: You sure you don't need that ride?

name: Hopper
line: Where the hell have you been?

name: Joyce
line: I overslept. What the hell's going on? It's freezing.

name: Hopper
line: Hey! Knock, knock. We have a visitor.

name: Hopper
line: So this thing, this shadow thing. You told your mom it likes it like this. It likes it cold?

name: Will
line: No. It's like... I don't have to think. I just know things now. Things I never did before.

name: Hopper
line: And, uh... what else do you know?

name: Will
line: It's hard to explain. It's like old memories in the back of my head, only... they're not my memories.

name: Will
line: I mean, I don't think they're old memories at all. They're... they're now-memories, happening all at once, now.

name: Will
line: I don't know. It's... it's hard to explain.

name: Joyce
line: I know it's hard but can you just... Can you try? For us?

name: Will
line: It's like... They're growing and spreading... killing.

name: Joyce
line: No, no, no. It's okay, sweetie.

name: Joyce
line: Hey, hey, sweetie... what if you didn't have to use words?

name: Mike
line: We need to talk. AV room. Right now.

name: Mike
line: Will didn't want me to tell anyone, but on Halloween night he saw a sort of shadow in the sky.

name: Mike
line: I don't know. But it scared him. And if Will really has True Sight... I mean, if he can really see into the Upside Down, maybe he saw that shadow again yesterday.

name: Lucas
line: So that's why he was frozen like that?

name: Lucas
line: Can it hurt him? I mean, if this shadow thing isn't from our world...

name: Dustin
line: Well, if you're in another plane, you can't interact with the material plane, so theoretically, no, the shadow can't hurt him.

name: Lucas
line: Yeah, if that's even what's happening. This isn't D & D. This is real life.

name: Mike
line: I'll go to Will's after school. See what's going on. You guys stay here and find Dart.

name: Lucas
line: Dart? What's he gotta do with this?

name: Mike
line: Will heard him in the Upside Down. I don't know how yet, but he's gotta be connected to all this. He's gotta be. If we find Dart, maybe we can solve this thing. Maybe we can help Will.

name: Nancy
line: Hey! Hey, assholes! Let us out of here!

name: Owens
line: Oh! Not very pleasant in here, is it? Sorry about that. Hospitality's not our strong suit. You know, scientists and all.

name: Owens
line: Yeah. Okay. You up for a little walk?

name: Owens
line: "Men of science have made abundant mistakes of every kind." George Sarton said that. You guys know who George Sarton is? Doesn't really matter. The point is, mistakes have been made. Yes.

name: Owens
line: Yes. Abundant mistakes, but, the men involved with those mistakes, the ones responsible for what happened to your brother and Miss Holland's death, they're gone. They're gone, and for better for worse, I'm the schmuck they brought in to make things better. But I can't make things better without your help.

name: Jonathan
line: You mean without us shutting up?

name: Owens
line: She's tough, this one. You guys been together long?

name: Owens
line: Wanna see what really killed your friend?

name: Owens
line: Teddy, I brought you an audience today. I hope you don't mind.

name: Owens
line: I'd call it one hell of a mistake. Wouldn't you? See, the thing is, we can't seem to erase our mistake... but we can stop it from spreading. Like, it's like pulling weeds. But imagine for a moment if a foreign state, let's say, the Soviets... If they heard about our mistake... do you think they would even consider that a mistake? What if they tried to replicate that?

name: Owens
line: The more attention we bring to ourselves, the more... the more people like the Hollands know the truth, the more likely that scenario becomes. You see why I have to stop the truth from spreading, too. Just, same as those weeds there. By whatever means necessary.

name: Owens
line: So, we understand each other now, don't we?

name: Joyce
line: This is more of the same.

name: Hopper
line: Oh, it's nothing. It's just scribbles.

name: Hopper
line: Does this mean anything to you?

name: Hopper
line: I mean, is it some sort of maze or a road?

name: Joyce
line: I mean, it's sort of forking and branching like... like lightning.

name: Joyce
line: No, the storm he drew was completely different. He used red. And this is all blue and it has some weird dirt color. I mean, maybe it's roots. 'Cause remember, he was saying it was spreading and...

name: Lucas
line: Hey, Max. Have you seen Dustin? We're supposed to meet after class.

name: Lucas
line: Hey, Max! Hey, where you going? Come on! We've gotta go look for Dart.

name: Max
line: What is wrong with me? What's wrong with you?

name: Max
line: No! I don't understand! You guys act like you want me to be your friend but then you treat me like garbage!

name: Max
line: Yes, it is! You go and hide in the AV Club, keeping secrets like we're in second grade or something. You know, I thought you guys wanted me in your party.

name: Lucas
line: There... there are just things. Things we can't tell you, all right? For your own safety.

name: Max
line: Did you keep secrets from El?

name: Lucas
line: How do you know about El?

name: Lucas
line: That was different. Trust me. Okay? That was just... just different.

name: Max
line: Okay. You know what? Forget it, okay? I don't wanna be in your stupid party anyway. I'm out.

name: Max
line: You still stink, by the way!

name: Billy
line: That kid you were talking to, who is he?

name: Billy
line: Why was he talking to you?

name: Max
line: It was just about a stupid class assignment.

name: Billy
line: Because, Max, you're a piece of shit, but we're family now whether we like it or not, meaning I'm stuck looking out for you.

name: Max
line: What would I ever do without...

name: Billy
line: Hey! This is serious shit, okay? I'm older than you. And something you learn is that there are a certain type of people in this world that you stay away from, and that kid, Max... That kid is one of them. You stay away from him, you hear me? Stay away.

name: Terry
line: Three to the right. Four to the left.

name: Terry
line: Three to the right. Four to the left.

name: Terry
line: Three to the right. Four to the left.

name: Mike
line: You know what? Now is not a really good time.

name: Mike
line: He's... he's just not feeling real well. He's laying down, so I'll tell him you stopped by, okay?

name: Mike
line: It's about the shadow monster, isn't it?

name: Owens
line: Doesn't really matter. The point is, mistakes have been made.

name: Owens
line: The men involved with those mistakes, the ones responsible for what happened to your brother and Miss Holland's death, they're gone...

name: Jonathan
line: Let's burn that lab to the ground.

name: Claudia
line: Mew-mew, dinner! Where are you? Mew-mew!

name: Dustin
line: Dart, I've gotta talk to you, buddy. It's about my friend, Will. I think...
